ai.harmony.ravel.primitives

Class ConfigurableComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • ai.harmony.ravel.primitives.Primitive
      • ai.harmony.ravel.primitives.ConfigurableComponent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Interface, Model, View

    public class ConfigurableComponent
extends Primitive
    A base class for interfaces and model, because they both have properties/configuration aspects that can be constants or references to variables set by the space during instantiation. Created by gcampagn on 2/1/17.
